articles.author: Umar Farooq
articles.title: PCB wants four out of 13 Asia Cup matches to be played in Pakistan - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The remaining nine matches, including the final, will be played at a neutral venue according to the board's hybrid model
articles.content: NewsThe remaining nine matches, including the final, will be played at a neutral venue according to the board's hybrid model

articles.author: Akash Podishetti
articles.title: Asian Paints shares jump 4% post Q4 results on margins boost - Economic Times
articles.description: The paint manufacturer attributed the strong results to sourcing and formulation efficiencies, as well as softening raw material prices, which helped improve margins significantly. EBITDA margins stood at 21.2%, exceeding Morgan Stanley's estimates of 18.6%. …
articles.content: Shares of Asian Paints climbed nearly 4% following the announcement of its fourth quarter results. The company improved its margins significantly during the March quarter, by 380 basis points year-on… [+1931 chars]
